# Phrase file for Curriki for language en # ---- please do not edit here # ---- please edit at http://demo:gelc@current.dev.curriki.org//xwiki/bin/view/Translations/XWiki/GlobalClassTranslations?language=en # # # Phrase file for Curriki for language en # ---- please do not edit here # ---- please edit at http://demo:gelc@current.dev.curriki.org//xwiki/bin/view/Translations/XWiki/GlobalClassTranslations?language=en # ## GLOBAL CLASS TRANSLATIONS
##I am pulling out many of the keys that are class based from individual translation files, such as Groups and Forms, and pulling them into this translation file. This is being done to
avoid duplicate lookup strings across translation files.
## To view the different classes, go here. http://next.dev.curriki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/CurrikiSpaceClass?editor=class
## I am also adding to this trans file elements that are used globally but not in class. Media Type roll over text for example.
##FROM GWT or XWIKI CORE loading.loading_msg=Lataa, odota... problemoccured=Virhe pyyntösi suorittamisessa. Virheen toistuessa lähetä sähköpostia osoitteeseen webmaster@curriki.org.
